mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (emp_no, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_contents) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContents})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_contents = #{noticeContents} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_file (notice_no, file_name, origin_name, file_size, file_type) VALUES (#{noticeNo}, #{fileName}, #{originName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType})
